website_summaries.verdict: Available in book and Kindle versions, this book includes tips, tricks, and practice questions for the current SAT.
pros: Answers are given with detailed explanations
Strategies are recommended for efficiency during the actual exam
The text is clear and easy to understand
cons: Although most buyers have been satisfied, a few say they wished it offered more adequate preparation/review of SAT material

customer_reviews.title: Great study tool!
customer_reviews.text: Looking through and studying the guide, it has helped me a lot. I'm able to strengthen some of my previous knowledge and truly practice the lessons or concepts that I am weak on. The only thing I wish though, was for there to be a full practice test at the end or a diagnostic test to see what I need improvement on. Overall, it's a great study tool!
customer_reviews.author: Griselda

customer_reviews.title: Thorough
customer_reviews.text: The study guide is excellent information. It was not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Listener

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t want to be prepared?
customer_reviews.text: Better to be prepared and feel encouraged before a test in order to help you achieve your goals.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great book to prepare for the SAT because there is valuable information in order to prepare. However some parts of the book can get confusing but still a good book to refresh past knowledge and learn some new tips.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read.
customer_reviews.text: Well laid out study guide. Covers what you need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Resource
customer_reviews.text: This is a great resource for people planning to sit for the SAT. I have tutored this subject for over 8 years, and this book gives you a great guide to follow to help you be successful.
customer_reviews.author: Cherish35

customer_reviews.title: Raises Scores, Reduces Test Anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: This book takes the stress and anxiety out of the S.A.T. test!! Practice test answers thoroughly explained in language easily understood AND to remember! Complimentary CD comes tomorrow that will further help with testing anxiety, but unsure I need it. This book is THAT GOOD! THANK YOU!!R
customer_reviews.author: Jama

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is well written, very easy to read & understand, and a total confidence boostera
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Very thorough and hits all key areas!
customer_reviews.text: I like how easily to follow the guide is. There are a lot of points the Prep guide goes over that are kep points addressed in the SAT exam. Overall this is an excellent resource for anyone taking the SATs.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great info
customer_reviews.text: I thought this book was very helpful in preparing for the SAT. They explained the answers to questions I got wrong or didn't understand. I would definitely recommend this book
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

product_meta.title: SAT Prep 2020 and 2021: SAT Study Guide 2020 and 2021 with Practice Test Questions [4th Edition]
